original_text: I will bring it forth, saith the Lord of hosts, and it shall enter into the house of the thief, and into the house of him that sweareth falsely by my name: and it shall remain in the midst of his house, and shall consume it with the timber thereof and the stones thereof.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 내가 이것을 보냈나니 도둑의 집에도 들어가며 내 이름을 가리켜 망령되이 맹세하는 자의 집에도 들어가서 그의 집에 머무르며 그 집을 나무와 돌과 아울러 사르리라 하셨느니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: and it shall enter into the house of the thief
and into the house of him that sweareth falsely by my name
sentences.korean_translation: 내 이름으로 거짓 맹세하는 자의 집에도 들어가리라

sentences.original_text: and it shall remain in the midst of his house
and shall consume it with the timber thereof
